measured_by: proportion of maximum voluntary contraction (MVC) determined with a dynamometer calibration task
justification: “Effort requirements were defined as proportions of participants' maximum voluntary contraction (MVC), as measured in the calibration task at the beginning of the experiment.”

measured_by: losing probability assigned to each option (10–90%)
justification: “Risk levels were defined as the losing probabilities of an option.”

measured_by: two-parameter power discounting model fitted to choices
justification: “choice behavior was best described by a model based on the two-parameter power function… we used the winning model as the reference… the two-parameter power discounting model also fit the data best.”

measured_by: stepwise titration procedure estimating reward–cost indifference points
justification: “we conducted another pre-scanning task … to estimate participant-specific indifference points for different combinations of rewards and costs … using a stepwise titration manner.”
